name: BUCK: Saturday Morning Cartoon Apocalypse
description: Inspired by Saturday morning cartoons of the early 90's, BUCK is a story driven, action-adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. You play as Buck, a motorcycle garage mechanic who decides to leave everything he knows behind in order to find the truth behind a girl's disappearance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows Vista with SP2, Windows XP with SP3 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4 GHz or better, AMD Athlon 64 2.4 GHz or better Memory: 5 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 Ultra (256MB) or ATI Radeon X1950 PRO (256MB) or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
